headline: Burke Wealth Management Repurchased Charter Communications (CHTR) Due to its Improving Visibility And Business Trends
summary: Burke Wealth Management, an investment management company, released its “Focused Growth Strategy” fourth quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The market had another outstanding year in 2024, with the S&P 500 rising 25.0%. The strategy had an even better year, with net returns of 28.4%. Looking a bit […]
